original_title: ΑΚΟΕ/ΑΜΦΙ: Η Ιστορία Μιας Επανάστασης (*Να κοιμάμαι στο στήθος του…)
overview: Greece, 1977. A proposed law brings gay men and “transvestites” together in a historic event and sparks the creation of the first Greek LGBT movement. For the next 13 years, AKOE and its magazine Amfi, would define the way LGBT Greeks think about themselves. This film celebrates their story and legacy.
title: AKOE/AMFI: The Story of a Revolution (*Just to sleep on their chest…)
